availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas S Powell (Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer and sergeant (U.S.A.))

body.p: Montgomery County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Madison County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary Anna S. Powell in Madison County, Kentucky, on October 11, 1842. Father of John W. Powell, Ibsan C. Powell, Sarah E. Powell, and Mary Ann B. Powell. Married to Leah Kennedy Powell in Montgomery County, Kentucky, on February 14, 1852. Farmer in Madison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Montgomery County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 24th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as first sergeant, private, and sergeant from January 6, 1862, to January 30, 1865.
